By Akshay Bandre
Why some people are mosquito magnets might be due to which soap they use in the shower, according to new research, as the pesky insects fly towards or away from specific aromas.

articles.title: What the latest research tells us about long COVID symptoms - PBS NewsHour
articles.description: More than three years into the pandemic, physicians and researchers are still struggling to understand long COVID. A recent study at Mass General Brigham has tried to take a step toward defining the condition affecting millions of people. PBS NewsHour digital…
articles.content:
